selections.name: Markwell Music
selections.reason: Consistent performer who finished a strong 2nd last start at Taree. Rates highest on recent figures and looks perfectly placed to break through here.

selections.name: Star Of Vega
selections.reason: First starter from the Godbolt yard with Aaron Bullock engaged. Trialled fairly but the jockey booking signals intent.

selections.name: Blue Dane
selections.reason: Finished 3rd last start and has shown enough consistency to hit the board in this weak maiden field.

selections.name: Billybago
selections.reason: Drawn the rail and could improve, but form is generally inferior to the top picks.

danger_horse.name: Star Of Vega
danger_horse.reason: Debutants with elite jockey bookings often perform above trial form.

selections.name: Ready Made Heir
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd at this track and distance last start. Drawn the rails and maps to get the perfect run. The one to beat.

selections.name: Odaka
selections.reason: Coming off a solid 2nd at Taree. Kris Lees stable is always dangerous in these provincial maidens.

selections.name: Fat Barry
selections.reason: Aaron Bullock takes the ride on this 3yo who showed potential on debut. Expect significant improvement.

selections.name: Brazen Diva
selections.reason: Has placed 3 times and draws well. A reliable exotic inclusion.

danger_horse.name: Odaka
danger_horse.reason: Strong stable and consistent recent form make her the main threat.

selections.name: Dubalene
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Has a good fresh record and Luke Rolls rides. Trialled well enough to suggest a bold showing.

selections.name: Our Emily
selections.reason: Won fresh two starts back and wasn't disgraced last time out. Drawn well and fits the class profile.

selections.name: Toomuchinformation
selections.reason: Proven first-up performer with class on his side. Barrier is tricky but has the ability to overcome it.

selections.name: Shine Your Light
selections.reason: Drops in class and should be competitive in this grade.

danger_horse.name: Toomuchinformation
danger_horse.reason: If he gets luck from the wide gate, his best form wins this.

selections.name: Xtreme
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten last start at Coffs Harbour. Ben Looker sticks and this looks like his race to lose despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Purple Haze
selections.reason: Improving with every run. 3rd at Scone last start was a solid indicator. Bullock aboard is a huge plus.

selections.name: Pear Bellini
selections.reason: Finished 3rd at this track last time out. Consistent enough to hit the frame again.

selections.name: Mini Boo
selections.reason: Not far away recently. Place claims in a field that falls away after the top few.

danger_horse.name: Purple Haze
danger_horse.reason: Bullock booking and upward trajectory make him the primary danger.

selections.name: Miss Defy
selections.reason: Coming off a win at Taree. Ben Looker retains the ride and she maps well from barrier 5.

selections.name: Raised By Wolves
selections.reason: Emergency who gains a start. Recent 2nd at Coffs Harbour was strong. Consistent type who will be in the finish.

selections.name: Fighting Magnus
selections.reason: Veteran who is always thereabouts. Wide barrier is a concern but has the class to feature.

selections.name: Amalfi Amore
selections.reason: Drawn well and has been running fair races. Can sneak into the placings.

danger_horse.name: Raised By Wolves
danger_horse.reason: Form is solid and gets in with a light weight.

selections.name: Sosueme
selections.reason: Broke maiden status impressively last start. Drawn the pole and looks capable of handling the step up in grade.

selections.name: Send A Telegram
selections.reason: Resumed with a solid 3rd. Will strip fitter and has the ability to challenge late.

selections.name: Outakandy
selections.reason: Resuming. Has won fresh before and drops from provincial grade. Watch betting.

selections.name: Sparkingly
selections.reason: Consistent type who rarely runs a bad race. Drawn well to get a soft run.

danger_horse.name: Send A Telegram
danger_horse.reason: Fitter for the first-up run and has upside.

selections.name: Lunaite
selections.reason: Snowden runner resuming. Trial winner and brings superior metropolitan form lines. The class runner of the field.

selections.name: Bodhi Boy
selections.reason: Resuming with Aaron Bullock aboard. Won 5 from 9. The main danger despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Pony Soprano
selections.reason: Won well last start and draws the inside. Will be prominent for a long way.

selections.name: Calypso Rocket
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick of wins. In career-best form and cannot be ignored.

danger_horse.name: Bodhi Boy
danger_horse.reason: Strike rate is elite and Bullock booking is a massive push.

selections.name: Etoile Filante
selections.reason: Won with authority at Newcastle last start. Bullock sticks, draws perfectly, and looks a class above this field.

selections.name: Pinot Nero
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed promise last prep and trialled well. Fresh form is good.

selections.name: Savvyrocker
selections.reason: Consistent mare who is always around the mark. Solid place chance.

selections.name: Highly Tempted
selections.reason: Has been racing well without winning. Can fill the exotics.

danger_horse.name: Pinot Nero
danger_horse.reason: Talented type who could sprint well fresh.
